titleStmt.title: Sundry Christian passions contained in two hundred sonnets Diuided into two equall parts: the first consisting chiefly of meditations, humiliations, and praiers. The second of comfort, ioy, and thankesgiuing. By H.L.
titleStmt.author: Lok, Henry.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
